      public AppManager() throws Exception
      Constructor This class creates a new instance of the ArrayList and new instance of the appMenu class Calls loadData and launchApplication method
      Throws:
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • launchApplication

      private void launchApplication() throws Exception
      The method launchApplication is responsible for running the App Calls showAppMenu from the appMenu Class(); Displays Four choices; searchToy, Add Toy, Remove Toy, and Save and Exit searchToy - Searches the toy Add Toy - Add a new toy to the database Remove Toy - Remove toy from the database Save and Exit - Saves and exit the program
      Throws:
      Exception

    • searchToyMenu

      public void searchToyMenu() throws Exception
      searchToyMenu displays four option to the user which searches for (toys serial number, toy name, toy type, and a return to Main menu)
      Throws:
      Exception

    • duplicateSerialNum

      public boolean duplicateSerialNum(String sn)

      Returns:

    • serialNumChecker

      public String serialNumChecker() throws Exception
      This method prompts the user for the serial number and checks for if the length of the serial number is equal to "10" if not it will output a message saying "Enter a 10 digit number"
      Returns:
      Throws:
      Exception

    • loadData

      public void loadData() throws Exception
      The loadData function reads the text from the text file. It determines what type of toy it is reading based on the Serial Number. After knowing the type of toy, the data is split into the appropriate category and uses those categorize objects to initialize correct type of toy and then adds those toys to the toy ArrayList.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • typeChecker

      public String typeChecker(char serialNumber)
      This method takes in the first digits of the serial number and uses a switch method to determine what type of toy it is.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber -
      Returns:
      Returns the type of toy as char

    • toySearchByName

      public void toySearchByName(String toyName)
      This methods searches a toy by its name and prints the output by using the toString method
      Parameters:
      toyName -

    • toySearchByType

      public void toySearchByType(char toyType) throws Exception
      This method check for the toy type (figure, board game, figures, puzzles) It does this by grabbing the length of array (.size) and checking if it is an instance of one of the toy model classes Prints the output by using the toString method from the toy classes
      Parameters:
      toyType -
      Throws:
      Exception

    • addToyAnimal

      public void addToyAnimal(String sn)
      Prompt the user for the characteristic of the new toy name, brand, price, availability, recommended age and for this particular toy (Animal) the type of Animal: Small, Medium and Large Then, it stores the user's input and calls the its corresponding method with parameters and pushes all the user's input
      Parameters:
      sn - - User's input serial number for the new toy

    • addNewToyBoardGame

    • addToyBoardGame

      public void addToyBoardGame(String sn)
      Prompt the user for the characteristic of the new toy name, brand, price, availability, recommended age and for this particular toy (BoardGame) the type of BoardGame: Player count (minimum amount of players, and maximum amount of player) Then, it stores the user's input and calls the its corresponding method with parameters and pushes all the user's input
      Parameters:
      sn - - User's input serial number for the new toy
